title: Community! Tell me your skin ideas.
body:
Yup! I know there's a lot of individual threads with suggestions. However..

I'm looking to doodle some skins in my spare time. I know there's a TON of great community concepts out there. Some are serious, some are silly. I'm interested in what's floating around. Got any suggestions? I know there's individual threads, but sometimes it's hard to skim through them all D:

TO CLARIFY! ***Ideas floated have no guarantee of actually happening.*** I'm just overall curious to see what shows up in this thread and what rises to the top, as well as maybe messing around with some ideas on my spare time.

Some pro-tips:

- While trolly ideas are great, but think of things that would really appeal to a wide variety of players. "Cool" is a subjective term, but ideate on things that would feel great on existing characters and would really add something special and appealing. 

- Think globally! That's an important aspect of skin development. While NA is where a lot of us on these forums live, we want to show love to the entire world! How cool were the Warring Kingdom skins? Wasn't River Spirit Nami gorgeous? Those are ideas inspired from cultures from around the world. If you are thinking of ideas that are more NA/EU derived, think of things that still appeal to the rest of the planet. Pool party skins are great examples. Everyone loves a pool party!

- Preserve the character. While Eternum Lux might be a neat looking idea, does that fit Lux's personality or core character? Is it complementary or does it distract? Additionally, preserve the characters graphic reads. You probably don't want to change the size of Draven's blades too much, or make Jarvan's lance really skinny. You probably don't want to give a character that doesn't have a helmet something that blocks the face too much. 

Anyways, give it some thought! I'd love to see what the cream of the crop ideas of the community are!

And as always...

replies.body: Shinigami Thresh.
This is amazing!
I always thought Crazy Cat Lady Yorick was one of the best skin ideas I've ever seen. http://37.media.tumblr.com/3d2611d642c3e5ec2372bbf97508a849/tumblr_mtzdibLfeN1s02hwfo1_1280.jpg

My friends and I always used to call out "Mr. President!" when taking a skillshot for an ally (e.g. Cait ult, Ashe arrow) like a bodyguard taking the bullet meant for a VIP.

Now that there's a champion whose kit basically revolves around doing this, I'd really enjoy seeing **Secret Service Braum** complete with sunglasses, earpiece, and a suit.  

If you wanted to get really patriotic with it you could deck out his shield in red, white, and blue and replace the ram with a bald eagle, but that might be a bit much... Maybe a parrot instead?

This definitely suits Braum...
Get it? SUITS? God, I need a life...

a freakin lasso

I think after the visual update to {{champion:29}} a Surprise party twitch skin is perfect for him

http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/197/a/5/surprise_party_twitch_by_kashuse-d7qxzn2.jpg

Never posted in the forums before, so I'm almost certain these images will just be links and won't embed, but here goes!

Here are a couple of concepts I've put together in my spare time 

http://33.media.tumblr.com/8d76c85311bcd133f54007176494863a/tumblr_n9tm8cMMUj1qk32lpo1_1280.png - Masquerade Fiora {{champion:114}} (just started this one last night so it's still pretty rough. Wanted to emulate the silhouette of a gown but with a functional breastplate, cuirass and pauldrons. I think it suits her Character really well, very aristocratic, high society. It could function like Neon Strike Vi where the mask is toggled on and off! I could see other Demacian nobility with skins in this theme, like Vayne, Lux, Garen, Jarvan...)

https://31.media.tumblr.com/629c40de41e5acd46a68c92e4a9597f6/tumblr_n9y1006rx81qk32lpo1_400.png - here's a pretty rudimentary paintover I made to go along with the concept, but you get the idea! 

http://33.media.tumblr.com/bea7d9a176761c3fc4861ec4d7fd902b/tumblr_n9cdwcEqXm1qk32lpo1_1280.png - Debonair Caitlyn {{champion:51}}  (again, just lines and flats but you get the jist)


http://37.media.tumblr.com/19a148a2dbfb8322029a1859e67aa2bb/tumblr_n7pdcltd4J1qk32lpo1_1280.jpg Victorious Fiora {{champion:114}}  I know someone would probably get murdered if she was this Season's Victorious skin for no reason, but I think something along the lines of like "Knight Captain Fiora" would be pretty cool!

https://38.media.tumblr.com/8f021e75bf370044bdee5489362292a3/tumblr_na8iohdQRE1qk32lpo1_1280.png -Ghost Bride Zyra {{champion:143}} I thought thematically it fit her character well, albeit a little similar to Haunted Zyra. I liked the idea of her plants becoming chains with thorned rose stems entwined inside of them, and the idea of her passive activating as a huge blue rose that she rose out of with her veil obscuring her face seemed like a really cool opportunity.

And I know these aren't technically skins, but playing around with VU ideas is something I like to do as well, so I figured I'd put them up!

http://38.media.tumblr.com/6dc2a50f7f186f38f4c151f9ea890c7f/tumblr_n7dhewaWvJ1qk32lpo1_1280.jpg - Morgana {{champion:25}} ( I liked the idea of the dark magic that corrupted her appearance manifesting as feathers and beginning to show in her hands where the magic is focused and working it's way up her arms to her shoulders, where you can see it begin to creep into her skin.)

http://37.media.tumblr.com/4584258557c1dbf07bf62f4991283fde/tumblr_n0uv11KP6T1qk32lpo1_r1_1280.png - Caitlyn {{champion:51}}
http://33.media.tumblr.com/a2678268499db05f42546c3ecba2a5d9/tumblr_n8tl70Xlxk1qk32lpo6_1280.png (also started working on a paintover of her official splash for this skin, just as a practice exercise! The original splash is gorgeous)

http://38.media.tumblr.com/c759f9f6cb9d8591964254c075eeef57/tumblr_n64chlod201tz0f3qo3_r1_1280.png and here's a LeBlanc {{champion:7}}  doodle!

Hextech Elise http://th04.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2014/126/a/3/skin_concept__hextech_elise_by_anodesu-d7hdrn1.jpg
(This one needs a second iteration of colour palletes and stuff, namely using purple and redoing the spider legs)

Ghost (sunken Spirit) Nami http://th07.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2014/153/0/7/sunken_spirit_nami_by_anodesu-d7kr5jw.jpg

http://31.media.tumblr.com/ba81e50b3bb1409987db2c7a7448d7cb/tumblr_n9t9hvZgFj1r4pvdpo1_1280.jpg


Not sure how to make these actually images. REGARDLESS! I'm just happy that I get to share them!

**Cosmic Orianna**

**For her Q**, the ball is a bright blue sun with dark blue spots and small flames, with a blue-fire trail when moving (instead of the plain white one).  Flames like this: 

http://imgur.com/zDZHlrl

**W **is semi-transparent blue circle (think mini Diana E, or the recall particle) that follows the theme of increased gravity, and has a "heavy" feeling when slowing enemies. 

http://imgur.com/uLwf4Ei http://imgur.com/DHMEVNP

**E** could have an algalon-type theme, using small stars as joints in a "cage-like" shield, similar to this: 

http://imgur.com/JLQ2GFa

**Finally, her R** could be an imploding sun, where her ball quickly turns bright white then BASS AND DAMAGE, etc. 

http://imgur.com/tzIxzFw

**As for her looks**, I was thinking bright lines and contrasting dark blues/neon-light blues. For example, something Tron-esque, like:

http://wallpoper.com/images/00/39/09/55/olivia-wilde_00390955.jpg

I really think this theme would fit her overall personality as a silent and unsuspecting, yet intensely explosive and sudden killer. The way space looks so calm and peaceful, but in reality it's in a state of constant chaos and change (inner turmoil much? Read dat lore m8) that isn't noticed until something really massive happens.
Mafia Fizz. Please God Do This

[Also Blogger Thorsten Erdt made a Sea Witch Nami skin that's just rad](http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JaJu93eE6sQ/Utf30maaqaI/AAAAAAAAAw8/MnUcjNWtjSE/s1600/sea+witch+nami.jpg)

Eastern jewel nidalee. Nuff said.

House Husband Tryndamere.

Instead of a sword he's got a giant vacuum cleaner. He's dressed like a 1950's style housewife (he's already wearing a kilt). When he ults he screams 'I JUST CLEANED THAT.'
Saw this Soul Reaver {{champion:91}} skin idea  on reddit yesterday, looks pretty awesome! http://i.imgur.com/Xewav4p.jpg

I would love to see skins in general used to advance lore. A good example would be Riven where you can see her past as part of Noxus, then her exile leading to redemption. I would love to follow a champion's development especially for a champ I like. Of course, random non lore skins would still be awesome but I feel like skins would be a nice way to develop each champions story as a whole. 


P.S. here are some skin ideas I've collected over the years. They are from various artists and champs and I take zero credit:
{{champion:254}} [Racequeen Vi](http://i.imgur.com/3oDZHIe.jpg)
{{champion:113}} [Sejuani](http://i.imgur.com/aWTWZqW.jpg)
{{champion:16}} [Demon Soraka](http://i.imgur.com/wRIHFjY.jpg)
{{champion:89}} [Eclipse Leona](http://i.imgur.com/7s2unyH.jpg) Which I believe other people have posted
{{champion:25}} [Wrath Morgana](http://i.imgur.com/6PX3U2d.jpg) which is an evolving skin [More wrath morgana](http://i.imgur.com/fVC087c.jpg)
{{champion:80}} [Cyborg Panth](http://i.imgur.com/E8gQJpK.jpg)
{{champion:92}} [Void Riven](http://i.imgur.com/dIjFNPP.jpg) [More Riven](http://i.imgur.com/5HqXZKr.jpg)
{{champion:102}} [Battlecast Shyvana](http://i.imgur.com/Mzabsfj.jpg)[Human Battlecast Shyvana](http://i.imgur.com/8hAwTcQ.jpg)

Brolaf was also a very popular skin. Why haven't you guys expanded that sort of "Frat boy" type line of skins? {{champion:77}} Dudyr anyone? I saw someone mention {{champion:201}} "Bro"um a few days ago as well, which would fit really well - Braum's shield made out of Graggy Ice boxes, he tosses Beer Cans instead of ice. And I mean, the puns just set themselves up. {{champion:31}} Bro'Gath, {{champion:3}} Galibro, and {{champion:35}} Shacbro...



Beyond that, {{champion:61}} Orianna is in dire need of some skins. She has only 4 total, Gothic and Sewn Chaos being her launch skins, Bladecraft in 2012, and the limited TPA one, which was only a 750 skin. With all the potential for her skins, some amazing suggestions have come out. One of the best ones being Rococo Orianna, seen [here](http://lamierfang.deviantart.com/art/LOL-Rococo-Orianna-332159903) and Ballerina Orianna as seen [here](http://erina.deviantart.com/art/League-of-Legends-Orianna-252740283?offset=20). Either one of those would be incredible additions to Orianna's lacking roster of skins for such a great champion.

(Fenghuang) **Chinese Phoenix Anivia!** It would be perfect for the Lunar Festival. Basically, something in the style of the Fenghuang, which have these gorgeous, vibrant rainbow tail feathers, and a gold/multicolored, fiery body. This would be a way to either finally get the flame Phoenix skin with fire particles without just turning Anivia red, or you could bling it up and give Anivia metallic gold particles. (A gold ult pool would look amazing!) 

This skin preserves the legendary creature feel to Anivia, where she is a mythological creature that has existed longer than just about everything else, across cultures and time. 

Some neat art examples here (none drawn by me, pulled off Google under the search term "Fenghuang").

* http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/347/c/a/fenghuang_chinese_phoenix_by_lioncrusher-d5nysuy.jpg 
* http://sunima.deviantart.com/art/The-phoenix-s-sword-351262031
* This temple here: http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/23/Longshan_Temple_-_Fenghuang.jpg/300px-Longshan_Temple_-_Fenghuang.jpg

{{champion:131}}    
I thought this was a super obvious candidate for the series of skins, but **Blood Moon Diana**. 

You have so much potential in taking the flow and beauty of Asian influence and applying Diana's trademark zealous violence to the theme. While I like what was done with **Lunar Goddess Diana**, I feel like the team completely missed the mark in how Diana is ultimately a very pretty champion, but she is also *violent* and *vengeful*. She is a warrior.

Some of my ideas for the skin:

* The same color tones as the other Blood Moon skins: crimson and ivory.
* Perhaps she could have a Kabuki mask, or heavy geisha makeup?
* Her spell effects could be red :D

**Blood Moon Diana** could very easily recapture both of those aspects of her character into one solid skin. IronStylus pls, I love this champion and she has so much potential.
Think it's time for Trundle to get his justice... http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2012/011/e/1/judge_trundle_by_mattcomgo-d4m2tyt.jpg
I'd really like to see this become a LeBlanc skin. Maybe Pixie Queen LeBlanc?

http://i.imgur.com/7iEHzdf.jpg

Cheerleader Lux

It's been 2 years Q_Q
